<schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="unqualified" targetNamespace="http://www.telefonica.com/schemas/UNICA/SOAP/common/v2" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:common.v2="http://www.telefonica.com/schemas/UNICA/SOAP/common/v2" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <annotation> <documentation>v2</documentation> </annotation> <simpleType name="ClientExceptionType_exceptionCategory"> <annotation> <documentation>ClientExceptionType_exceptionCategory</documentation> </annotation> <restriction base="xsd:string"> <enumeration value="SVC"> <annotation> <documentation>SVC</documentation> </annotation> </enumeration> <enumeration value="POL"> <annotation> <documentation>POL</documentation> </annotation> </enumeration> <enumeration value="SEC"> <annotation> <documentation>SEC</documentation> </annotation> </enumeration> </restriction> </simpleType> <simpleType name="E164Type"> <annotation> <appinfo> <label>E164Type</label> </appinfo> <documentation>A phone number following the E164 format. An optional "+" sign followed by a set of digits</documentation> </annotation> <restriction base="xsd:string"> <pattern value="\+?[0-9]+"/> </restriction> </simpleType> <simpleType name="EmailAddressType"> <annotation> <appinfo> <label>EmailAddressType</label> </appinfo> <documentation>Userâ€™s e-mail address</documentation> </annotation> <restriction base="xsd:string"> <pattern value=".+@.+\..+"/> </restriction> </simpleType> <simpleType name="ExceptionPersistenceType"> <annotation> <documentation>ExceptionPersistenceType</documentation> </annotation> <restriction base="xsd:string"> <enumeration value="PERMANENT"> <annotation> <documentation>PERMANENT</documentation> </annotation> </enumeration> <enumeration value="TEMPORARY"> <annotation> <documentation>TEMPORARY</documentation> </annotation> </enumeration> </restriction> </simpleType> <simpleType name="FlagType"> <annotation> <appinfo> <label>FlagType</label> </appinfo> <documentation>Generic yes/no flag</documentation> </annotation> <restriction base="xsd:string"> <enumeration value="yes"> <annotation> <documentation>yes</documentation> </annotation> </enumeration> <enumeration value="no"> <annotation> <documentation>no</documentation> </annotation> </enumeration> </restriction> </simpleType> <simpleType name="GenderType"> <annotation> <appinfo> <label>GenderType</label> </appinfo> <documentation>List of possible gender values</documentation> </annotation> <restriction base="xsd:string"> <enumeration value="male"> <annotation> <documentation>male</documentation> </annotation> </enumeration> <enumeration value="female"> <annotation> <documentation>female</documentation> </annotation> </enumeration> </restriction> </simpleType> <simpleType name="ImeiType"> <annotation> <appinfo> <label>ImeiType</label> </appinfo> <documentation>IMEI and IMEI/SV format</documentation> </annotation> <restriction base="xsd:string"> <pattern value="[0-9]{2}-[0-9]{6}-[0-9]{6}-[0-9]{1,2}"/> </restriction> </simpleType> <simpleType name="ImsiType"> <annotation> <documentation>ImsiType</documentation> </annotation> <restriction base="xsd:string"> <pattern value="[0-9]{6,15}"/> </restriction> </simpleType> <simpleType name="Ipv4AddressType"> <annotation> <appinfo> <label>Ipv4AddressType</label> </appinfo> <documentation>An IPv4 address</documentation> </annotation> <restriction base="xsd:string"> <pattern value="((0|(1[0-9]{0,2})|(2(([0-4][0-9]?)|(5[0-5]?)|([6-9]?)))|([3-9][0-9]?))\.){3}(0|(1[0-9]{0,2})|(2(([0-4][0-9]?)|(5[0-5]?)|([6-9]?)))|([3-9][0-9]?))"/> </restriction> </simpleType> <simpleType name="Ipv6AddressType"> <annotation> <appinfo> <label>Ipv6AddressType</label> </appinfo> <documentation>An IPv6 address</documentation> </annotation> <restriction base="xsd:string"> <pattern value="((([0-9A-Fa-f]{1,4}:){7}([0-9A-Fa-f]{1,4}|:))|(([0-9A-Fa-f]{1,4}:){6}(:[0-9A-Fa-f]{1,4}|((25[0-5]|2[0-4]\d|1\d\d|[1-9]?\d)(\.(25[0-5]|2[0-4]\d|1\d\d|[1-9]?\d)){3})|:))|(([0-9A-Fa-f]{1,4}:){5}(((:[0-9A-Fa-f]{1,4}){1,2})|:((25[0-5]|2[0-4]\d|1\d\d|[1-9]?\d)(\.(25[0-5]|2[0-4]\d|1\d\d|[1-9]?\d)){3})|:))|(([0-9A-Fa-f]{1,4}:){4}(((:[0-9A-Fa-f]{1,4}){1,3})|((:[0-9A-Fa-f]{1,4})?:((25[0-5]|2[0-4]\d|1\d\d|[1-9]?\d)(\.(25[0-5]|2[0-4]\d|1\d\d|[1-9]?\d)){3}))|:))|(([0-9A-Fa-f]{1,4}:){3}(((:[0-9A-Fa-f]{1,4}){1,4})|((:[0-9A-Fa-f]{1,4}){0,2}:((25[0-5]|2[0-4]\d|1\d\d|[1-9]?\d)(\.(25[0-5]|2[0-4]\d|1\d\d|[1-9]?\d)){3}))|:))|(([0-9A-Fa-f]{1,4}:){2}(((:[0-9A-Fa-f]{1,4}){1,5})|((:[0-9A-Fa-f]{1,4}){0,3}:((25[0-5]|2[0-4]\d|1\d\d|[1-9]?\d)(\.(25[0-5]|2[0-4]\d|1\d\d|[1-9]?\d)){3}))|:))|(([0-9A-Fa-f]{1,4}:){1}(((:[0-9A-Fa-f]{1,4}){1,6})|((:[0-9A-Fa-f]{1,4}){0,4}:((25[0-5]|2[0-4]\d|1\d\d|[1-9]?\d)(\.(25[0-5]|2[0-4]\d|1\d\d|[1-9]?\d)){3}))|:))|(:(((:[0-9A-Fa-f]{1,4}){1,7})|((:[0-9A-Fa-f]{1,4}){0,5}:((25[0-5]|2[0-4]\d|1\d\d|[1-9]?\d)(\.(25[0-5]|2[0-4]\d|1\d\d|[1-9]?\d)){3}))|:)))(%.+)?"/> </restriction> </simpleType> <simpleType name="ServerExceptionType_exceptionCategory"> <annotation> <documentation>ServerExceptionType_exceptionCategory</documentation> </annotation> <restriction base="xsd:string"> <enumeration value="SVR"> <annotation> <documentation>SVR</documentation> </annotation> </enumeration> </restriction> </simpleType> <simpleType name="SipUriType"> <annotation> <appinfo> <label>SipUriType</label> </appinfo> <documentation>SIP URI format according to RFC 3261</documentation> </annotation> <restriction base="xsd:string"> <pattern value="sip:.+@.+"/> </restriction> </simpleType> <simpleType name="TelUriType"> <annotation> <appinfo> <label>TelUriType</label> </appinfo> <documentation>Tel URI for Telephone Numbers according to RFC 3966, based on a simplified regular expression. A complete regular expression matching Tel URI format is too complicated and probably is difficult to be matched during automatic schema checking</documentation> </annotation> <restriction base="xsd:string"> <pattern value="tel:.+"/> </restriction> </simpleType> <complexType name="AddressType"> <annotation> <appinfo> <label>AddressType</label> </appinfo> <documentation>Base information for an Address, abstract type</documentation> </annotation> <sequence> <element minOccurs="0" name="street" type="xsd:string"/> <element minOccurs="0" name="streetNumber" type="xsd:integer"/> <element minOccurs="0" name="locality" type="xsd:string"/> <element minOccurs="0" name="region" type="xsd:string"/> <element minOccurs="0" name="postalCode" type="xsd:integer"/> <element minOccurs="0" name="country" type="xsd:string"/> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="ClientExceptionType"> <annotation> <appinfo> <label>ClientExceptionType</label> </appinfo> <documentation>Returned by server in case of Client related faults</documentation> </annotation> <sequence> <element name="exceptionCategory" type="common.v2:ClientExceptionType_exceptionCategory"/> <element name="exceptionId" type="xsd:integer"/> <element name="text" type="xsd:string"/> <element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="variables" type="xsd:string"/> <element minOccurs="0" name="exceptionPersistence" type="common.v2:ExceptionPersistenceType"/> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="ErrorInformationType"> <annotation> <documentation>ErrorInformationType</documentation> </annotation> <sequence> <element minOccurs="0" name="clientException" type="common.v2:ClientExceptionType"/> <element minOccurs="0" name="serverException" type="common.v2:ServerExceptionType"/> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="ExtensionType"> <annotation> <documentation>ExtensionType</documentation> </annotation> <sequence> <element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="any" type="xsd:anyType"/> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="IpAddressType"> <annotation> <appinfo> <label>IpAddressType</label> </appinfo> <documentation>A generic IP address, including both v4 and v6 address formats</documentation> </annotation> <sequence> <element minOccurs="0" name="ipv4" type="common.v2:Ipv4AddressType"/> <element minOccurs="0" name="ipv6" type="common.v2:Ipv6AddressType"/> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="NameValuePairType"> <annotation> <appinfo> <label>NameValuePairType</label> </appinfo> <documentation>Generic name-value pair</documentation> </annotation> <sequence> <element name="name" type="xsd:string"/> <element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="value" type="xsd:string"/> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="OtherIdType"> <annotation> <appinfo> <label>OtherIdType</label> </appinfo> <documentation>Extended type for additional user identifiers</documentation> </annotation> <sequence> <element name="type" type="xsd:string"/> <element name="value" type="xsd:string"/> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="SearchParamsType"> <annotation> <appinfo> <label>SearchParamsType</label> </appinfo> <documentation>Generic sequence of name-value pairs, to be used in searches</documentation> </annotation> <sequence> <element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="param" type="common.v2:NameValuePairType"/> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="ServerExceptionType"> <annotation> <appinfo> <label>ServerExceptionType</label> </appinfo> <documentation>Object returned by server in case of Server related faults</documentation> </annotation> <sequence> <element name="exceptionCategory" type="common.v2:ServerExceptionType_exceptionCategory"/> <element name="exceptionId" type="xsd:integer"/> <element name="text" type="xsd:string"/> <element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="variables" type="xsd:string"/> <element minOccurs="0" name="exceptionPersistence" type="common.v2:ExceptionPersistenceType"/> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="SessionTokenType"> <annotation> <appinfo> <label>SessionTokenType</label> </appinfo> <documentation>For UNICA APIs access with Login</documentation> </annotation> <sequence> <element name="session_token" type="xsd:string"/> <element name="consumer_key" type="xsd:string"/> <element minOccurs="0" name="requestor_id" type="xsd:string"/> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="SimpleReferenceType"> <annotation> <appinfo> <label>SimpleReferenceType</label> </appinfo> <documentation>For those services that require a reference to a Web Service, the information required to create the endpoint information is contained in this type When possible always use just anyURI as url.</documentation> </annotation> <sequence> <element name="endpoint" type="xsd:string"/> <element name="interfaceName" type="xsd:string"/> <element name="correlator" type="xsd:string"/> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="TimeZoneType"> <annotation> <appinfo> <label>TimeZoneType</label> </appinfo> <documentation>Timezones shall be referred to timezone schemas or timezone databases using the tzDatabase attribute. The default timezone database is Olson</documentation> </annotation> <sequence/> <attribute name="tzDatabase" type="xsd:string"/> </complexType> <element name="clientException" type="common.v2:ClientExceptionType"/> <complexType name="fault"> <annotation> <documentation>fault</documentation> </annotation> <sequence> <element minOccurs="0" name="faultcode" type="xsd:string"/> </sequence> </complexType> <element name="serverException" type="common.v2:ServerExceptionType"/> <element name="sessionToken" type="common.v2:SessionTokenType"/> </schema>
